sources.title: The Exterminators of the Year 3000 (1983) Robert Iannucci | Action, Sci-Fi  Full Movie
sources.description:
They killed to survive...
In the year 3000, the Earth has been rendered a desert by nuclear war. A group of survivors goes in search of rare and valuable water, but standing in their way are the evil Exterminators, who live only to cause pain and misery.

Original title: Il giustiziere della strada

Director: Giuliano Carnimeo
Writers: Elisa Briganti, Dardano Sacchetti, José Truchado
Stars: Robert Iannucci, Alicia Moro, Luciano Pigozzi
Genres: Action, Sci-Fi

00:00 Full Movie
02:41 A condemned ex-police officer, David Steed, is about to face his fourth execution attempt after surviving the gas chamber, hanging, and firing squad.
07:22 Officer Speed goes on a mission to collect a parking ticket in Creektown, unaware of the top-secret experiments happening there.
19:12 A detective with superpowers solves crimes and impresses his superior officer.
29:54 A police officer and his partner stumble upon a robbery but mistake it for a fishing business.
38:33 A police officer named Speed miraculously survives two falls without injury, leading to suspicion and investigation.
49:35 Sergeant and his team are tasked with picking up Miss Labouche from the airport, but encounter trouble along the way.
1:00:39 Dave Speed, a detective with superpowers, loses his abilities when he sees the color red.
1:05:38 Evelyn is struggling to accept Dave's superpowers, but he insists they will grow to like them.
1:15:49 A corrupt cop loses his superpowers when he sees red and is framed for murder.

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: The year 3000, after a nuclear war turned the earth into a desert. A group of survivors in a cave runs out of water and desperately needs new supply. The last guy they sent out didn't return. His 10 years old son Timmy wants to join the next team. They know where they'll find a well, but the problem it the way there, which is controlled by a savage gang of motorcyclists under the bloodthirsty Crazy Bull. A lonesome stranger who Timmy meets on the way may help.
metadata.Writer: Elisa Briganti, Dardano Sacchetti, José Truchado
metadata.Actors: Robert Iannucci, Alicia Moro, Luciano Pigozzi
